content: I would like to get the says combinator #5980 merged so we can try it out in the library.
I don't think this discussion needs to hold up merging it, but we should also have a think about how widely we want to use it.
My preference is that we initially just allow people to use it who want to try it out, and that it is acceptable but not required to include it in front of simp only blocks generated by simp?.
